title: The Gift of a Strong-Will
itunes:author: Guest: Cynthia Tobias
itunes:summary:
Let's be honest, there are moments when your strong-willed child is difficult to get along with. What do you do in those situations? John and Danny give some ideas for how to talk with your strong-willed son or daughter, even when it's hard.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Cynthia Tobias' book "You Can't Make Me (But I Can Be Persuaded)" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-08-12?refcd=1140101

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/the-gift-of-a-strong-will/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
